alert.note: Alert for Davison; Hanson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 01 at 7:15AM MDT until August 06 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River near Mitchell affecting Davison and Hanson Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River near Mitchell. * WHEN...Until Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, the lower banks overflow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CDT Monday the stage was 17.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 AM CDT Monday was 17.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Friday evening and continue falling to 16.7 feet by next Monday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 AM CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu James River Mitchell 17.0 17.3 Mon 7 AM 17.3 17.2 17.1 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this morning at 915 AM CDT.
